Title: Construction Notice
Text:
The construction of the Focus Array will officially begin on September 10th, when the Tacetite Industrial Transportation Station will be responsible for the transfer work. Relevant staff members are requested to pay attention to the maintenance of road safety, carefully check the materials and regularly monitor the environment to ensure the safe storage of the sounding liquid.
During the construction process, non-technical personnel should stay away from the construction site and are prohibited from coming into direct contact with the liquid without protection. If you feel unwell, please report promptly.

AL158 August 30, 2008
